description.text: A leshy warden gains this ability at 6th level, except her effective druid level for the ability is equal to her druid level â€“ 2 for the purpose of determining the number of times per day she can use it. At 6th level, the leshy warden can assume the form of only Small or Medium plant creatures, as per plant shape I. At 8th level, she can take the form of a Large plant creature, as per plant shape II. At 10th level, she can take the form of a Huge plant creature, as per plant shape III.
